description: Toronto Airport Taxi Limo provide complete ground transportation to and from Toronto Pearson airport. We have all kinds of vehicles such as Sedan, SUV, Minibus which is suitable as per your group size.

reviews.title: Smooth Transfer from Toronto Pearson airport
text: Had a smooth transfer from Toronto Pearson international airport to Ritz Carlton hotel in Toronto city.  Company provided with Cadillac Escalade and driver Mr Singh  was very accommodating to have a stop on the way to pick some beers. I will definitely use Toronto Airport Taxi Limo services again for my Busniess trip.

reviews.title: Great transfer
text: Very good company, they provided very professional transfer from Toronto pearson international airport. Highly recommended!!!!

reviews.title: Good Airport company
text: Took Airport limo from Toronto Pearson international airport to Niagara Falls with my family. The suv was great , neat, moreover Mr Paul the driver was great.

reviews.title: Niagara falls transfer
text: wonderful experience with this company. we took service from Toronto pearson international airport to niagara falls. ride was smooth, reasonably priced

reviews.title: Limo service from Pearson
text: Easy to book with, Mr Shawn the driver take care of us ,the SUV was new and smells great. Kids had good fun. We will definitely use them

reviews.title: Always on time
text: Safe drive with new car, we got to our destination on time, the driver was nice and friendly, we are looking forward to book for our return

reviews.title: Great service from Toronto airport
text: Every thing was perfect and transparent, they picked me from Toronto Pearson international airport and dropped at Waterloo airport. The SUV was super comfortable, driver Mr Cliff was polite and friendly.

reviews.title: Best value for money
text: Booked transfer to Niagara falls from Toronto airport last minute and they accommodated us. The drive was vey smooth and they give the best value for money . Recommend to everyone!!!!

reviews.title: Niagara falls transport
text: Hired this company for private transportation from Toronto. very happy with their service, very neat cars, friendly diver.

reviews.title: Totally surprised and extremely Happy!
text: My family and I is on vacation to see the Falls. We did booked a private transfer with Toronto Airport Taxi Limo. Our driver was so awesome! Very knowledgeable about Canada, the falls and much about the county. He was so fun and easy to talk to. He and I talked the whole time for the 2 hour drive.

reviews.title: Five star airport service!!!!
text: This limo service from Toronto Pearson airport was awesome.The driver contact us when our flight landed and loaded all bags , highly recommended airport service

reviews.title: One of the best limo services
text: Toronto Airport Taxi limo provided excellent round-trip service for my family's recent trip. We were 4 adults and one teen with five checked suitcases. The vehicle (Cadillac Escalade ESV) was nice, clean and able to accommodate us and our luggage. Vehicle arrived early for pickup, which was very warm welcomed. Communication with the driver was excellent as well. He answered all of my questions and gave the best advice on how best to book since my family and I arrived in Toronto on two different flights. I definitely will use always in future visits and recommend others it’s really family transportation and all above fair pricing with great services.

reviews.title: I would highly recommend
text: Very professional, polite and helpful staff. The cars were very clean and they drove us to airport and picked us up when we returned. On the way back, we had almost 2 hour delay because we came back on Sunday of the March break and the airport was super busy. They communicated with me the whole time and were patiently waiting for us. Will use again and recommend to others.

reviews.title: Limo services from Toronto airport
text: I landed in Toronto Pearson airport and took this service ,the driver was very friendly and waited for us patiently and loaded our bags.The SUV was clean ,drive was smooth.Moreover its very convenient and economic.

reviews.title: 5 star
text: Thank you Mr Radi for providing excellent service and prices in a fantastic vehicle - you made us feel like VIPs!

reviews.title: Best Taxi Limo company in Toronto Pearson Airport
text: Went to airport to pick my son coming from Iran. I booa taxi and they give complimentary upgrade to a limo.

reviews.title: Good limo service to London
text: Booked limo service from Toronto airport to London Ontario with this company. The company give the best service for our family.

reviews.title: Good service
text: Good driving, friendly drivers, clean cars, overall a good experience we wil use this service again.

reviews.title: Wow service
text: Efficient service from Toronto airport. We booked SUV limo and the vehicle was neat smells good.Driver was super friendly.

reviews.title: Wonderful service
text: Great service very fast . Always polite and professional. Students get discounts. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Kept us waiting
text: We had pre ordered a taxi limo to take us from the airport to our hotel, he was paged 3 times before he finally turned up, everyone else who had booked seemed to get their rides within 5 minutes, ours took over 20, disappointing as meant we caught the busy traffic.

reviews.title: Overbearing
text: I booked a trip with a set fair of $37. I was given an option to vehicle. When we got there I was told that it would cost more because I selected a different vehicle. I was charged over triple the amount, then given a card and told to call for a ride upon return. I did, and was informed that there were no vehicles available. I asked for a referral to another company, was told they didn't do that. I was stranded.

reviews.title: Satisfied customers
text: We were a family of 4 going on vacation and booked this service to travel to and from Pearson Airport. The service provided was excellent the drivers were on time for pickup and our flight coming home was delayed and our driver was right there waiting for us..the vehicles were very clean and provided lots of room to accomodate all luggage. Thankyou Toronto Airport Taxi Limo and we will definitely use your service again and happily recommend to others.

reviews.title: Excellent Airport Pickup experience
text: Timely pick-up from Toronto Pearosn. Safe Comfortable ride . Reasonably priced. Driver was courteous and went above and beyond  to makesure we were taken care of properly.

reviews.title: Wonderful Experience!
text: Wonderful service. It was a great experience working with these professionals. I highly recommend this company to anyone who is looking for airport service.

reviews.title: Amazing airport limo
text: Booked a limo from Toronto pearson, the actual limo didnt show up, Gave Toronto airport taxi limo a call, they accomodate us last minute. All staff was courtious and accomodating. Highly recommonded!!!

reviews.title: Wonderful Pearson Airport limo service
text: Had a wonderful service from Toronto Pearson Airport with my family. Driver waited for us in Airport and drove us to hotel safely.

reviews.title: Not as expected
text: I would first like to start this off by saying that I am a pretty easy going person, and I rarely complain about services. It was my first time using this company and I had higher expectations, especially for the price that I paid. The driver met my guest and I at the location that was decided, and was transparent about taking a couple of minutes to get there due to the traffic. I appreciated that! He said he would call me again when he arrived at the decided location. Luckily I had asked what the plate number was, because he did not call me when he got to the location.

When I got into the vehicle, I thought there would be water bottles included during the trip, as stated in the details, but there weren't any. If I had known, I would have purchased water before heading into the car. I also thought the driver would be more professional. During the drive, he answered a few calls and seemed to have a harsh tone with the person he was talking to. It was kinda terrifying. Lastly the driving was a bit scary as well. The driver would switch lanes even though the lines on the road were solid. For someone who is anxious in cars, it was definitely a scary experience for me and my guest. I do not think I will use this service again :(

reviews.title: Toronto airport limo
text: Had Toronto airport taxi limo service to go to city centre from airport. Their service was great and highly recommend.

reviews.title: Excellent Service
text: Excellent service! Timely pickup (3:30 am) for an early morning flight and courteous driver. Took care of all of our luggage (party of 5) with no problem and dropped us off at our respective terminals (1 and 3). Will definitely use this company again on my next trip to Toronto!

reviews.title: Save your money use the train to get to the city
text: We found the trip very easy from the airport to our hotel, we jumped on the train to the city which took about 25 mins to the Union Station in the city centre. cost was about £16 for 2 of us.

reviews.title: Reliable transport for a first time visit.
text: Good communication with the driver.  He altered the pick up location to be a lot closer to the delta baggage claim, which was appreciated.

reviews.title: Great limo ride
text: Toronto airport taxi limo provided with a great service from Toronto International Airport. The greeter was waiting with name sign and the driver was on time , car was neat. I will definitely use them again…

reviews.title: 5 star Niagara transfer
text: Great customer service with great prices. We booked this service after doing our research on internet, but it was totally worth. They provide us with a clean new Cadillac Escalade. Even company accommodate the last minute revision in pick up time. Driver Mr Paul is fabulous and friendly....

reviews.title: Great Transportation Company
text: We had a sking holiday to Blue mountain. Toronto airport Taxi limo provided us with the best ground transportation service to and from Toronto Pearson airport. Their vehicles are neat and clean and also large enough to carry our Sking gears. Highly recommend.!!!!

reviews.title: Airport limo at the best
text: Wonderful Experience, lever expected from a cab company. They took care of my Travel from start to ens. highly recomdended

reviews.title: Perfect transfer
text: Very good transfer service. The drivers arrived on time. Kept us informed the whole time before they came to pick us up. We used them from the airport to the city center and back. Really recommend this transfer company.

reviews.title: Amazing service, would book again!
text: The service provided was of high quality and definitely made me feel like a VIP. The car was clean and I was provided with water and hand sanitizer upon arrival. The driver was able to compromise to my requests without complaints and the ride was smooth and comfortable. 10/10, would love to book a service with them when the opportunity arises!

reviews.title: Best Pearson Airport Taxi  service
text: Very good limo company, had a good experience from Toronto airport taxi limo . Mr Jay is professional and he waited patiently till we clear all airport procedures .

reviews.title: There are many interesting things to see and do within walking distance from here, like you can even board road plane fr
text: Good service. The company has good, clean and well maintained cars . My husband after travelling so long hours in plane found very comfortable journy in taxi.
I would love to recommend them for their good service n good prices .
